scripts.clean:allure: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'allure-results'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f => fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dir, f))); console.log('allure-results limpiado'); }"
scripts.clean:report: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'allure-report'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('allure-report eliminado'); }"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:allure && npm run clean:report
scripts.test: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions --tags @Regression
scripts.test:all: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions
scripts.test:regression: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions --tags @Regression
scripts.test:tinymce: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions --tags @TinyMCE
scripts.test:nested: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions --tags @NestedFrames
scripts.test:windows: npm run clean:allure && cucumber-js src/test/resources/features --require src/test/js/stepDefinitions --tags @Windows
scripts.allure:open: npm run allure:generate && allure open allure-report
